reviews.review: 服务器有点拉，不过游戏真的棒
buy if you have a computer that can handle it

Finishing up Portal 2 after replaying favorite games from growing up was a treat. It is honestly impressive that these games can still have a draw and replay value, qualities that puzzle games have a unique disadvantage at. The humor is the kind of dark humor and situational irony that I personally love and I think can appeal to a wide audience. I remember being 11 year old me patiently waiting for the latest Portal game and what a blast it was to experience. The nostalgia road was fun to walk down and I am glad that it is not over yet. Portal and Portal 2 have active modding communities to provide fan-made levels and content that is everything a fan could want. I am currently working on Portal Stories: Mel and am blown away at the dedication of the fan-base. There's no reason to not play these games and to do your part contributing to Science!
This game is a masterpiece, play it if you haven't!

Não sei o que dizer, mesmo se ignorares a gameplay e os puzzles o jogo ainda é amazing. O ambiente, a história, tudo é perfeito. Mesmo depois da 3 gameplay ainda encontro coisas novas escondidas em pequenas salas. Apenas joga, vale muito a pena.
Portal 2 is a masterpiece, even surpassing the incredible experience that portal 1 was

PORTAL 2 это ещё 1 шедевр от VELVE . Лично для меня это 1 из любимых игр , очень классная головоломка про продолжение истории Chel в этот раз у нас  появляется друг Витли мы приходим к GLADOS и случайно воскрешаем а потом побеждаем её и главным модулем становится Витли . в общем все эту историю знают , а если нет то обязательно узнайте купив его ! Короче ставлю этой игре 10 ложных тортов из 10 порталов ловушек для друга! И спасибо брату зато то что подарил её мне!
this is a great game and you dont need to have played the first game to know the story.
